overview: Grasshopper began the Live Goes On world tour at the Hong Kong Coliseum on November 5-8 and 10, 2017. The trio surprised fans with performances of various B-side tracks such as "Loneliness," "Good and Bad," "Unbelievable" and "Present Tense." They also sang hit jams such as "Forget Love, Dance The Samba," "Three Minutes of Indulgence," and "We," as well as the new single "Live Goes On".
title: Live Goes On Grasshopper Concert 2017
